title: Fossil fuel dominance in electricity generation to end by 2030, renewable to cross 50% share: RBI
description: The Reserve Bank of India reports that fossil fuels' dominance in India's electricity generation will end by the decade's close. Renewable energy is expected to surpass 50% globally. The RBI emphasizes the need for tripling renewable investments to meet net-zero targets and highlights the importance of addressing sectors like steelmaking and aviation.
